definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="damagesource_isequalto"><field name="damagetype">IN_FIRE</field><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">IN_FIRE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="damagesource_isequalto"><field name="damagetype">CUSTOM:BleedingDamage</field><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_play_break_effect"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.MOSS_BLOCK</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
